description: A Command is a discrete control used for supervisory control.

contents.name: DiscreteValue
contents.description: The Control variable associated with the MeasurementValue.

contents.name: ValueAliasSet
contents.description: The ValueAliasSet used for translation of a Control value to a name.

contents.name: normalValue
contents.description: Normal value for Control.value e.g. used for percentage scaling.

contents.name: value
contents.description: The value representing the actuator output.
